snippet.title: Two hurt in Melbourne CBD hit-run
snippet.content: TWO people have been hit by a car near St Paul's Cathedral. Police are searching for the driver, who hit two pedestrians at the intersection of Flinders and Swanston streets, before fleeing the scene at 6.30pm. The two victims have suffered non life-threatening injuries. Emergency services remain at the scene. Victoria Police spokeswoman Hannah Rowlands said police were investigating. "The driver of the vehicle did not stop at the scene and is yet to be located," she said. More to come
